H0.text: rain sleet or snow that contains a high concentration of acids is called. Toxic Precipitation

H1.text: rain sleet or snow that contains a high concentration of acids is called. Corrosive Downpour

H2.text: rain sleet or snow that contains a high concentration of acids is called. Polluted Hydrometeor

H3.text: rain sleet or snow that contains a high concentration of acids is called. Acid rain

A4.text: Acid rain is rain with a pH less than 5.

A5.text: Acid rain is rain or any other form of precipitation that is unusually acidic, meaning that it has elevated levels of hydrogen ions (low pH).
